content.raw:
Just realised that there is a ray sensor test in pull request #277. It makes sense to have a separate RaySensor_TEST there as a unit test. The test I added here to regression/laser.cc is more of a system test that checks sensor interaction with objects in the environment. Let me know if they need to be merged somehow.

Update:

- Update `Stationary_EmptyWorld` to use `SpawnRaySensor`
- Added a check in `Stationary_EmptyWorld` to only do range value comparisons against exiting data in scans_cmp.h when `_physicsEngine` is ode.
content.html:
Just realised that there is a ray sensor test in pull request #277. It makes sense to have a separate RaySensor_TEST there as a unit test. The test I added here to regression/laser.cc is more of a system test that checks sensor interaction with objects in the environment. Let me know if they need to be merged somehow.

Update:

  • Update Stationary_EmptyWorld to use SpawnRaySensor
  • Added a check in Stationary_EmptyWorld to only do range value comparisons against exiting data in scans_cmp.h when _physicsEngine is ode.
